Citing SVT¶

|DOI|_

Article¶

BibTex¶

You can use the following BibTeX entry to cite SVT:

@article{sexton2022svcco,
  title={{}},
  author={},
  journal={},
  volume={},
  pages={},
  year={},
  publisher={}
}
